# The Crash

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE)
require(plotly)
require(quantmod)

```


```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(plotly)

AIG <-getSymbols("AIG", src = "yahoo", from = "2008-08-16", to = "2008-10-16", auto.assign = FALSE)
df <- data.frame(Date=index(AIG),coredata(AIG))

p<- df %>%
    plot_ly(x = ~Date, type="ohlc",
            open = ~AIG.Open, close = ~AIG.Close,
            high = ~AIG.High, low = ~AIG.Low) %>%
    layout(title = "What Happened to AIG in September 15th, 2008?")

p

```
